snippet.title: Skyhook - Launch Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Skyhook is a 1-4 player party brawler where you fight with grappling hooks! Available now on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/skyhook-switch/

This is the game I made before Shotgun Farmers, and it's finally on the Switch! I hope that you'll give it a try!

Fight with grappling hooks in this party brawler for one to four players. Play as a treasure hunting cat or a land swimming shark as you swing around the stage taking out your opponents.
Local Multiplayer Arena Combat for 1-4 Players

◆ Use your grappling hook to kill your enemies and swing around the level in free for all combat.

◆ Choose from five unique characters, like the fast moving cat Jade or the teleporting assassin Anara.

◆ Mount vehicles like the cannon firing Airship or the lightning shooting Gryphon.

◆ Watch for chests that fall from the sky, stuffed with powerups like the berserker helmet, the shield, and the doppelganger mirror.

◆ Customize matches with Special Options like Double Jump and Deadly Dodges.

◆ No friends around? No problem! Play against up to three CPU players at different difficulty levels.

#NintendoSwitch #partygames #partygame

I Made A FREE Item Shop!
https://youtu.be/XT1L0Xjk-70
5 Years of Game Development
https://youtu.be/zmPPH0XPmkQ
HUGE UPDATE! Shotgun Farmers - Haunted Harvest Devlog
https://youtu.be/UYaGfqne3Q8
Crop Drop & Consoles - Shotgun Farmers Devlog
https://youtu.be/qmlaErSzNSA
Shotgun Farmers Game Dev - Tiktok Highlights
